attributes.action: Honour his election pledge to legislate for a Full Pint of Beer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 1997 the Government promised to legislate so that all pubs and clubs must sell a full pint of draught beer.
Ten years on this still hasn't happened and we are being robbed of £1.3m every day by unscrupulous landlords.
